entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
